name: Let me Grow.
description:
The garden hose is dripping. Sadly - no 'headplant' stands below. 
However - headplants has long vipes, that can be used to get water. Only one headplant will survive that. Which one? Give it a try!

The best experience is with Game Pad (wireless will do best!)

Technical info : on startup window go to Input section and change it to fit your hardware. Options to change:
LeftThumbX, LeftThumbY, RightThumbX, RightThumbY, XButton, TriangleButton

First 4 of them are gamepad analogs left and right with X and Y axis. XButton will be used for confirm options, TriangleButton is back button, in battle window it runs Pause Menu.

You can also use WSAD and arrow keys, Enter/Return to confirm, and escape to back and pause.

Developed by Tryzmapoem:
Graphics : Paulina "Ploina" Zdunek
Code & Music: Piotr "Rudy" Rudnicki
